class youzanyunservice extends baseservice { static function getaccesstoken($appid = null){ if($appid){ $data = m('youzanapp')->where(['id' => $appid])->find(); }else{ $data = m('youzanapp')->find(); } if(!$data){ return self::createreturn(false, null, '找不到应用'); } if($data['expires'] > time()){ return $data['access_token']; }else{ return self::refreshaccesstoken($appid); } } static function refreshaccesstoken($appid = null){ if($appid){ $data = m('youzanapp')->where(['id' => $appid])->find(); }else{ $data = m('youzanapp')->find(); } $token = new token($data['client_id'], $data['client_secret']); $accesstoken = $token->gettoken($data['authorize_type'], ['kdt_id' => $data['grant_id']]); m('youzanapp')->where(['id' => $data['id']])->save([ 'access_token' => $accesstoken['access_token'], 'expires' => floor($accesstoken['expires']/1000), 'scope' => $accesstoken['scope'], 'authority_id' => $accesstoken['authority_id'] ]); return $accesstoken['access_token']; } /** * 获取有赞订单 已完成 * * @param $start_time * @param $end_time * @return array */ static function getorders($start_time, $end_time){ $accesstoken = self::getaccesstoken(); $client = new client($accesstoken); $method = 'youzan.trades.sold.get'; $apiversion = '4.0.0'; //设置参数 $params = [ 'status' => 'trade_success', 'start_update' => date('y-m-d h:i:s', $start_time), 'end_update' => date('y-m-d h:i:s', $end_time) ]; echo "
"; print_r($params); echo "
"; $response = $client->post($method, $apiversion, $params); if($response['code'] == 200){ return self::createreturn(true, $response['data']); }else{ return self::createreturn(false, $response); } } static function saveorder($data){ $count = m('youzanorder')->where(['tid' => $data['order_info']['tid']])->count(); if(!$count){ m('youzanorder')->add([ 'tid' => $data['order_info']['tid'], 'status' => $data['order_info']['status'], 'status_str' => $data['order_info']['status_str'], 'total_fee' => $data['pay_info']['total_fee'], 'payment' => $data['pay_info']['payment'], 'phone' => $data['buyer_info']['buyer_phone'], 'created' => $data['order_info']['created'], 'success_time' => $data['order_info']['success_time'], ]); } } }
